nodes.documentation:
@dev Mints an `_initialSupply` amount(s) of a new token to the minter (msg.sender for now).
 @param _initialSupply number of token the minter balance is increased by.
nodes.name: mint
burn

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: Get the balance of an account's Tokens.

returns._0: owner's balance of the Token type requested

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs

returns._0: owner's balance of the Token types requested (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair)

burn(address,uint256,uint256).details: Burns a `_value` amount(s) of `_id` sender the `_sender` address.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Queries the approval status of an operator for a given owner.

returns._0: true if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval.

mint(uint256).details: Mints an `_initialSupply` amount(s) of a new token to the minter (msg.sender for now).

params._initialSupply: number of token the minter balance is increased by.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage all of the caller's tokens.

params._approved: true if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval.
params._operator: address to add to the set of authorized operators.

transfer(address,address,uint256,uint256.details: Transfers `_value` amount of an `_token` sender the `_sender` address to the `_receiver` address specified.

params._receiver: address of the recipient whose balance is increased.
params._sender: address of the holder whose balance is decreased.
params._value: number of tokens the holder balance is decreased by and match what the recipient balance is increased by.
